name: naboris
description: Simple http server built on httpaf and lwt.

scripts.source: rm -f tmp-build-env && esy build-env | grep DUNE_BUILD_DIR > tmp-build-env && source tmp-build-env && rm tmp-build-env
scripts.build-docs: esy b dune build @doc && npm run source && rm -rf docs/html && cp -r $DUNE_BUILD_DIR/default/_doc/_html ./docs/html
scripts.clean-world: npm run clean && npm run clean-install
scripts.test-coco: npm run clean && npm run gen-test-json && npm run test && npm run coco-report && npm run gen-prod-json
scripts.full-libev-test: esy @libev-test install && LIBEV_TEST=true esy @libev-test b dune runtest
